Title: Application Code Scanning
Description: No visibility to code scanning processes or results.  Code vulnerabilities could exist that would lead to infiltration of applications and data.
Mitigation: Implement Code scanning capability to collect vulnerabilties as they are introduced.  Ensure CI CD processes are well established to ensure code quality.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Stale Endpoint Remediation
Description: Currently there are many computer objects that are still active, but have not been used in over 30 days.  This creates long term risk for lost inventory, machine impersonation, and old assets being reenabled that are unprotected.
Mitigation: Move old computers to disabled OU.  Implement Inventory Control to ensure endpoints are collected and destroyed.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Disaster Recovery Plan (DR)
Description: Comprehensive DRP/BIA for enterprise (On Prem, AWS, Azure)
Mitigation: Develop a DR/BCP plan by establishing a an overall program, documenting processes, and scheduling testing on a yearly basis
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: MDM Endpoint Management
Description: Currently 310 Endpoints do not have MDM agent running.  This makes it difficult to manage and deploy patches on unmanaged endpoints.
Mitigation: Investigate and remediate missing agents on endpoints
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Disaster Recovery Plan (DR)
Description: Do not have documented or tested disaster recovery plan
Mitigation: Develop and implement DR processes aligned to BIA objectives
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Endpoint Management Remediation
Description: Currently some endpoints are unmanaged by IT but accessing the environment.  Need to implement processes to accelerate remediation of environmental risk to reduce the attack surface
Mitigation: Integrate unmanaged endpoints into Intune to enable IT management.  Implement Zero Trust to not allow unmanaged assets onto the environment
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Disaster Recovery Plan (DR)
Description: Do not have documented or tested disaster recovery plan. Unable to recover efficiently/effectively
Mitigation: Develop and implement DR processes aligned to BIA objectives
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Identity & Access Management
Description: Not Implemented. Unauthorized Access
Mitigation: Implement IAM program and processes
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Inventory Management
Description: Enable CMDB to improve inventory management & change management
Mitigation: Review and select a CMDB technology and implement.  Onboard all assets into CMDB and create appropriate metadata.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Logging & Monitoring
Description: Not Implemented. Increased risk of attack activity not being identified
Mitigation: Validate logging and monitoring for ISE services
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Endpoint Vulnerabilities Remediation
Description: Currently vulnerabilities are not being addressed in a timely manner.  Need to implement processes to accelerate remediation of environmental risk to reduce the attack surface
Mitigation: Implement processes to patch vulnerabilities based on severity
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Control  Framework Alignment
Description: Environment is not fully aligned to known frameworks (i.e. CIS). Increased risk of missing controls or consistency of control deployments.
Mitigation: Align controls to appropriate frameworks and track and monitor
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Outdated DNS-like Windows  protocols
Description: Execute Link-Local Multicast Name Resolution (LLMNR) Poisoning. Attain domain credentials
Mitigation: Deprecate old protocols and refactor apps to support new protocol
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: MFA Implementation
Description: Multifactor is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement MFA for all access to system
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Mobile O365 Access
Description: User have native access to O365 making it difficult to securely manage access and protect data
Mitigation: Restrict mobile access natively and use MS mobile applications
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Next-Gen Firewall Hygiene
Description: Firewall Rules, IPS/IDS, etc
Mitigation: Leveraging Firemon perform a scan and assessment of the firewalls.  Prioritize and remediate findings
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: SSO Implementation
Description: SSO is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement Federation for WP user access.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Deprecated/Outdated  Software
Description: lambdas running Python 2.7. No longer be able to update or create new server less actions after September 30th, 2021
Mitigation: Upgrade Python lambdas to latest version
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Some user accounts do not have MFA enabled
Description: Identified 36 User accounts that are not setup properly to require multi-factor authentication when logging in to environment
Mitigation: Ensure all users have MFA enabled and that VPN and O365 require MFA
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: SSO Implementation
Description: SSO is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement Federation for WP user access.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: MFA Implementation
Description: Multifactor is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement MFA for all access to system
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Attack Surface Management
Description: Need to identify At Risk platforms and/or platforms no longer in use to reduce the attack
Mitigation: Inventory all apps and capabilities, determine utilization, and develop plan for decommissioning or remediation of risks.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: MFA Implementation
Description: Multifactor is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement MFA for all access to system
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: DNS Filtering Remediation
Description: Currently 211 Endpoints do not have DNS agent running.  This leaves endpoints vulnerable to threats from high risk IPs.
Mitigation: Investigate and remediate missing agents on endpoints
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Open ethernet ports
Description: Lack of physical network access control. Attain access to the corporate  network
Mitigation: Implement ISE capability on physical network to ensure device trust
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: SSO Implementation
Description: SSO is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement Federation for WP user access.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: MFA Implementation
Description: Multifactor is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement MFA for all access to system
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: SSO Implementation
Description: SSO is implemented on many but not all WP systems.
Mitigation: Implement Federation for WP user access.
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: O365 Remote Access
Description: Currently users have unfetterred access to O365 from any device increasing risk of data exfiltration.
Mitigation: Implement conditional access for untrusted devices
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Incident Response Plan (IR)
Description: Do not have documented Incident Response,  Restore, or Malware Removal plan
Mitigation: Design IR processes
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Data Transfer Logging
Description: Not logging critical changes or data transfers. Increased risk of attack activity not being identified
Mitigation: Implement DLP Program
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: No Defined Software  Development  Lifecycle (SDLC)
Description: Higher risk for  code  injections  or  other  types  of  application  security  risks
Mitigation: Develop Application Security Program to enable core function of secure application Coding
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: EDR Agent Remediation
Description: Currently 225 Endpoints do not have EDR agent running.  This leaves endpoints vulnerable to malicious applications.
Mitigation: Investigate and remediate missing agents on endpoints
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com

Title: Privileged Identity Management
Description: Implement PIM program for comprehensive privileged assess management
Mitigation: Review MS PAM capability and determine if it fits needs.  If not evaluate and select a 3rd party PAM platform
Creator: mike.stewart@paretocyber.com
